title: Lauren Stephens says Team USA to back Chloé Dygert in road race
content:
Dygert already won two rainbow jerseys at the 'super worlds' and Stephens says that Team USA will be in full support behind the 26-year-old.

Read the full article at Lauren Stephens says Team USA to back Chloé Dygert in road race on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
